At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Sorcery cards in your graveyard have dead drop. The dead drop cost is equal to their mana cost. [i](You may cast a card your graveyard for its dead drop cost if an opponent has lost life this turn. Then exile it.)[/i]
